results.content: Great intro to Java using Eclipse.
I've tried other online learning programs and they have been difficult to see the code being generated but not here!  A straight forward easy example and outline.

response.content: I am glad you enjoyed, thank you for the support!
response.content_html: I am glad you enjoyed, thank you for the support!

results.content_html: I've tried other online learning programs and they have been difficult to see the code being generated but not here! A straight forward easy example and outline.

results.content: This course have bad resolution, not easy to watch it on mobile and do not expect to learn java basic in just 1-2 hour.

response.content: We provide all lessons simple for beginner students to build a foundation, hence we are glad you finished the course so quickly. As for mobile viewing, we do recommend you complete the course on your computer where you can practice the subject, it is one of the requirements and it would be difficult to read the code on a small screen, especially if not watching in HD. Thanks for the feedback!

results.content:
It was a good experience for me to acquire such a nice basic java knowledge, I really believe this will help me in the future.

The instructor gave clear and nice explanation to the basic of java, it was easy to understand and follow what he was saying.

results.content:
This is a great introductory course! Covers all of the basics very well, and the project at the end was a good test of what you learn.

I'd recommend this course to anyone looking for an introduction to Eclipse and Java!
